Figure 3:An example of a response that GPT-4o gradescorrectlywhen the image is not given as input but gradesincorrectlywhen the image is given. The left columns are the original text in Korean, and the right columns provide the English translations. When the image is given, the judge model attempts to judge the response based on the image and hallucinates that the door in the middle of the photograph is green. When the image is not given, the judge has no reason to grade the response based on anything other than the given criteria.
